CWVPS: 45% OFF KVM VPS Offers with Unmetered Bandwidth + 5 FREE 4 GB Trial VPS Coupon!

buffalo, california, cheap vps, cheap windows vps, cheapwindowsvps, chicago, dallas, illinois, kvm, los angeles, new york, texas September 28, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308


Welcome back, Cheap Windows VPS!  They were featured most recently back on November 27, 2020.

They’ve got a fantastic exclusive offer for LowEndBox readers!

  • The first five (5) LEB readers to use the code LEB4GBFREE will get a free 3-month (quarterly) trial on their 4GB VPS Plan!  Please be sure to thank them in the comments below!

Their offer this month is for a couple nice plans:

  • A 4GB package (Windows or Linux) at $4.95/month (normally $9/month)
  • A 8GB package (Windows Linux) for just $9.35/month (normally $17/month).

Both packages are KVM based, include unmetered bandwidth, and offer a variety of operating system choices including both Linux and Windows.  You can deploy in Buffalo (NY), Los Angeles (CA), Chicago (IL), or Dallas (TX).

Cheap Windows VPS  has been in business for over six years and has been featured numerous times on LowEndBox. Their longevity is a positive factor when considering your next VPS provider.  Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy). They accept PayPal, Perfect Money and BitCoin.

Here’s a little about Cheap Windows VPS in their own words:

“Cheap Windows VPS was launched in 2015 to fill the gap in the Windows VPS market by offering cost-effective, cutting-edge KVM Windows VPS hosting solutions. Cheap Windows VPS hosts thousands of VM’s with customers spanning all corners of the earth.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with Cheap Windows VPS.
